name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】「 Outside the Box 」Nanashi Mumei Birthday Celebration 2024 【#MoomsDay3DLIVE】 [gl7CwlEg2ZI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei performs 'LET IT OUT' while playing the guitar.

subtitles.original: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.

subtitles.original: Daydream, 遠く去った あの日のヴィジョン
subtitles.english: Daydream, the vision of that day gone far away

subtitles.original: 君の夢が 横で外れても
subtitles.english: Even if your dream goes astray beside me

subtitles.original: 僕は歌い 橋を架けよう
subtitles.english: I will sing and build a bridge

subtitles.original: だからSilence 鳴らすな 鼓動
subtitles.english: So Silence, don't let the heartbeat sound

subtitles.original: どこまでも 高架線沿ったリズム
subtitles.english: A rhythm along the elevated tracks forever

subtitles.original: 過ぎた街並みは 終わりの合図と溶け
subtitles.english: The passing townscape melts with the signal of the end

subtitles.original: 伝えない ディザミかけのイメージに
subtitles.english: Into an inexpressible, half-disassembled image

subtitles.original: 目が覚めてゆく 孤独のショート
subtitles.english: Waking up from a short moment of solitude

subtitles.original: 砕けた Crying dream 飛び立った 逆相の間違い
subtitles.english: A broken Crying dream, a mistake of running in the opposite direction taking flight

subtitles.original: 誘い 溺れ はしゃいでても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm lured, drowning, and frolicking

subtitles.original: 僕は歌い 舵を捨てよう
subtitles.english: I will sing and throw away the helm

subtitles.original: だからSilence 響くな 鼓動
subtitles.english: So Silence, don't let the heartbeat echo

subtitles.original: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.

subtitles.original: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.

subtitles.original: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.

subtitles.original: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, daybreak has come.

subtitles.original:
LET IT OUT
Lyrics:福原美穂 Music:福原美穂・山口寛雄
subtitles.english:
LET IT OUT
Lyrics: Miho Fukuhara Music: Miho Fukuhara, Hiroo Yamaguchi

subtitles.original: Let it all out, Let it all out.
subtitles.english: Let it all out, Let it all out.

subtitles.original: 強がらなくていいんだね
subtitles.english: You don't have to pretend to be strong

subtitles.original: 誰かが描いてた 壁の落書きの花が揺れる
subtitles.english: Flowers in graffiti on a wall someone drew are swaying

subtitles.original: 自分らしさなんて 誰もわからないよ
subtitles.english: No one knows what it means to be "yourself"

subtitles.original: 長い長い道の途中で 無くしたり 拾ったり
subtitles.english: Losing things, picking things up on a long, long road

subtitles.original: 急に寂しくなって 泣いちゃう日もあるけど
subtitles.english: There are days when I suddenly feel lonely and cry, but...

subtitles.original: 涙も痛みも 星に替えよう
subtitles.english: Let's turn tears and pain into stars

subtitles.original: 明日を照らす 灯をともそう
subtitles.english: Let's light a flame that illuminates tomorrow

subtitles.original: 小さな迷いも 二人で創ろう
subtitles.english: Let's create even small hesitations together

subtitles.original: 星屑を 強く光る 永久（とわ）を咲かそう
subtitles.english: Let's make the stardust shine brightly and let eternity bloom

subtitles.original: Let it all out, Let it all out.
subtitles.english: Let it all out, Let it all out.

subtitles.original: 足りないことだらけよね
subtitles.english: It's full of things that are lacking, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 足りなくていいんだね
subtitles.english: It's okay to be lacking

subtitles.original: だから君と出会えたんだ
subtitles.english: That's why I was able to meet you

subtitles.original: 「確か」が何なのか それが知りたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to know what "certainty" was

subtitles.original: 小さなナイフを 靴の下に隠してた
subtitles.english: I hid a small knife under my shoe

subtitles.original: 強がってついた 嘘のほうがずっと痛かった
subtitles.english: The lies I told while acting strong hurt much more

subtitles.original: 本当は怖いよ だけど生きてゆく
subtitles.english: I'm actually scared, but I'll keep living

subtitles.original: 笑顔の君を 風が撫でてゆく
subtitles.english: The wind strokes you as you smile

subtitles.original: 小さな手かざして 二人で創ろう
subtitles.english: Holding up our small hands, let's create together

subtitles.original: 星屑を 強く光る 永久（とわ）を咲かそう
subtitles.english: Let's make the stardust shine brightly and let eternity bloom

subtitles.original: 正しいことが間違ってたらどうすればいい？
subtitles.english: What should I do if the right thing is wrong?

subtitles.original: 悲しいことが正しかったら受け入れるだけ？
subtitles.english: If sad things are right, do I just accept them?

subtitles.original: 失くしたと思ってた でも君が知ってた
subtitles.english: I thought I lost it, but you knew

subtitles.original: 君がいて本当に良かった
subtitles.english: I'm really glad you were here
